info.name: Hyper-lightweight XOR ...
info.description:
Yes we can :-D

( see https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4ssSWn challenge )

renderpass.code:
#define f(a,b) floor(mod(length(i/iResolution.xy*4.-vec2(cos(a),sin(b))-3.)*16., 2.))
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 i) { float t=iDate.w; o=vec4( f(t,t)!=f(1.4*t,.7*t) ); }
renderpass.name: Image
